verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* Job \w replied|strong="H6030"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*:

“\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w can|strong="H3201"\w* \w do|strong="H3201"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* plan \w of|strong="H4480"\w* Yours \w can|strong="H3201"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w thwarted|strong="H1219"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3045"\w* asked, ‘\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* conceals \w My|strong="H3045"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*?’\f + \fr 42:3 \ft Job 38:2\f* \w Surely|strong="H5046"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* spoke \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w things|strong="H6381"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w did|strong="H3651"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w understand|strong="H3045"\w*, \w things|strong="H6381"\w* \w too|strong="H4480"\w* \w wonderful|strong="H6381"\w* \w for|strong="H3045"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H3045"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3045"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, ‘\w Listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w will|strong="H8085"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*. \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w will|strong="H8085"\w* \w question|strong="H7592"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w* \w shall|strong="H3045"\w* \w inform|strong="H3045"\w* \w Me|strong="H4994"\w*.’\f + \fr 42:4 \ft Job 38:3 and Job 40:7\f*

\w My|strong="H8085"\w* ears \w had|strong="H5869"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w You|strong="H7200"\w*, \w but|strong="H7200"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w You|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w retract|strong="H3988"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* words, \w and|strong="H6083"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w repent|strong="H5162"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w and|strong="H6083"\w* \w ashes|strong="H6083"\w*.” The LORD Rebukes Job’s Friends

\w After|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w these|strong="H1696"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Job|strong="H3808"\w*, \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* Eliphaz \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Temanite|strong="H8489"\w*, “\w My|strong="H3068"\w* wrath \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* \w against|strong="H2734"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w friends|strong="H7453"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w Me|strong="H1696"\w* accurately, \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Job|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w bulls|strong="H6499"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* rams, \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w My|strong="H3947"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Job|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H5930"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H5921"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w My|strong="H3947"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Job|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w accept|strong="H3947"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w prayer|strong="H6419"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w folly|strong="H5039"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* accurately \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w Me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w My|strong="H3947"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Job|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H5650"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* Eliphaz \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Temanite|strong="H8489"\w*, \w Bildad|strong="H1085"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Shuhite|strong="H7747"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zophar|strong="H6691"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Naamathite|strong="H5284"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w accepted|strong="H5375"\w* \w Job|strong="H6440"\w*’s \w request|strong="H6440"\w*. The LORD Blesses Job

\w After|strong="H7453"\w* Job \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* \w for|strong="H1157"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w friends|strong="H7453"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w restored|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* prosperity \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w doubled|strong="H3254"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* former possessions.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* brothers \w and|strong="H3068"\w* sisters \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w prior|strong="H6440"\w* \w acquaintances|strong="H3045"\w* \w came|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* dined \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w consoled|strong="H5110"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w adversity|strong="H7451"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H5414"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w piece|strong="H7192"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w silver|strong="H7192"\w* \f + \fr 42:11 \ft Hebrew a kesitah; the value or weight of the kesitah is no longer known.\f* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w ring|strong="H5141"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* Job’s latter days \w more|strong="H1961"\w* \w than|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w first|strong="H7225"\w*. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* owned 14,000 \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, 6,000 \w camels|strong="H1581"\w*, 1,000 \w yoke|strong="H6776"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* 1,000 female donkeys.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1121"\w* \w also|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w seven|strong="H7658"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*.

\w He|strong="H7121"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* first daughter \w Jemimah|strong="H3224"\w*, \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w Keziah|strong="H7103"\w*, \w and|strong="H8034"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w Keren-happuch|strong="H7163"\w*.

\w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w women|strong="H1323"\w* \w as|strong="H3303"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H3303"\w* \w as|strong="H3303"\w* \w Job|strong="H3808"\w*’s \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* could \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H5159"\w*, \w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* father \w granted|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* brothers.

\w After|strong="H7200"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, Job \w lived|strong="H2421"\w* 140 \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* fourth \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w so|strong="H4191"\w* Job \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w full|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w years|strong="H3117"\w*.
